languages.text: Whenever the wearer spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, all adjacent enemies suffer a −<u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, all adjacent enemies suffer a −<u>wearer's AGI bonus</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} penalty until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, all adjacent enemies suffer a −<u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者耗尽{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}时，所有邻近敌人承受{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于装备者的<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>%，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, all adjacent enemies suffer a −<u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者耗尽{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}时，所有邻近敌人承受{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于装备者的<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>%，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

languages.text: Когда персонаж тратит все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, противники на соседних клетках получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} персонажа</u>% до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, all adjacent enemies suffer a −<u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж тратит все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, противники на соседних клетках получают штраф к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} −<u>бонус ЛВК персонажа</u>% до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.

Когда персонаж тратит все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, противники на соседних клетках получают штраф к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} −<u>бонус ЛВК персонажа</u>% до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}をすべて消費するたびに、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで、隣接する敵すべてが<u>使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>％の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, all adjacent enemies suffer a −<u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}をすべて消費するたびに、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで、隣接する敵すべてが<u>使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>％の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador gasta todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, todos los aliados adyacentes pierden −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} del portador </u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta que comience el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, all adjacent enemies suffer a −<u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador gasta todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, todos los aliados adyacentes pierden −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} del portador </u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} hasta que comience el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger all seine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} verbraucht, erleiden alle angrenzenden Feinde einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Trägers</u> % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Trägers.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer spends all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, all adjacent enemies suffer a −<u>wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger all seine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} verbraucht, erleiden alle angrenzenden Feinde einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Trägers</u> % auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur dépense tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, tous les ennemis adjacents subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de -<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} de l'utilisateur</u> % jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'utilisateur.
